manifest.name: Folder Focus Mode
manifest.description: Focus file explorer on chosen folder and its files and subdirectories, while hiding all the other elements.
manifest.author: Grochowski

data.manifestValue: Focus file explorer on chosen folder and its files and subdirectories, while hiding all the other elements.
data.communityListValue: Focus the file explorer on chosen folder and its files and subdirectories, while hiding all the other elements.
